category: Cozy → Hanger Cover Other Headwear → Other Jewelry → Other Accessories → Other Applique / Embellishment
full_text: The Èveryday Bow was created The bow starts at a single point and grows with increases, knit flat in garter stitch. The body has a subtle tilt, giving it a playful, interesting shape. Decreases are worked at the opposite end, keeping the points aligned. The piece is finished with a crochet edge. It’s a small, fun project that’s quick to knit and perfect for a hair elastic, bag, or anywhere you like. Finished Size Length (flat, side to side): approximately 28″ / 71 cm Width (flat, top to bottom): varies slightly depending on gauge and yarn Gauge Measured over garter stitch: varies depending on yarn and needle choice Yarn Worsted weight yarn: 40 g / 75–85 m for main color Optional contrast color: 5 g / 5–10 m Materials 6 mm / US 10 knitting needles Crochet hook no.3 Weaving needle 1 stitch marker Difficulty ★☆☆☆☆- Perfect for beginners
